title: The Amygdala Hijack
description: Learn The Amygdala Hijack in one minute.

hook.text: He said something he'd regret for years ‚Äî in less than two seconds. His rational brain didn't even get a vote.

buildup.text: Daniel Goleman coined 'amygdala hijack' ‚Äî when the emotional brain overrides the thinking brain in moments of threat.

discovery.text: During a hijack, the amygdala triggers fight-or-flight before the prefrontal cortex can process what's actually.

twist.text: The amygdala can't tell the difference between a physical threat and a verbal insult.

climax.text: De-escalation starts with recognizing your own hijack. If your heart races and jaw clenches, your amygdala has taken.

punchline.text: You can't resolve conflict while your survival brain is driving.

quiz.question: What is an amygdala hijack?
options: The emotional brain overriding rational thinking during perceived threats
